thread.title: Texas man dragged German Shephard behind wheelchair | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Texas man dragged German Shephard behind wheelchair | Daily Mail Online

author: Forrest Hanson For Dailymail.Com
title: Texas man dragged German Shephard behind wheelchair | Daily Mail Online
text: Texas man is arrested after being caught on camera DRAGGING his German Shephard behind his motorized wheelchair Mario Cardona, 59, had owned a female German Shephard named G2 Shocking footage shows him dragging her on the sidewalk behind his wheelchair A concerned woman confronted him about the abuse. He shouted: 'It's my dog' She uploaded video of the incident to social media and called police Cardona was arrested and faces animal cruelty charge. G2 is in an animal shelter Published: 17:49 GMT, 19 February 2017 | Updated: 00:32 GMT, 20 February 2017 172 shares
